name: SOLORM
description: Sketch for my analogue outdoor light/tree installation at Helsingør Health Center. Commissioned by the Danish Arts Council and CATCH for their project "Healing Art”  My concept is inspired by the Harvard research of fractal heart rate analysis, based on fractals similar to branchings in trees. SOLORM invites visitors to dwell with the tree, to let their heart rate to synchronise with the fractal pattern of the tree.  NTF sketch experiments on 3D scan: https://skfb.ly/onxWu - Cinema 4D, Apple Mot
